decoworld.model.world.combat.stats

Interface StatListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HasCombat, HasExperience, HasHealth, HasStats
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlliedGroup, AmmoCrate, ArcherMob, Arrow, CollectableEntity, CombatEntity, Crate, DestructibleBoulder, EliteMob, FastArrow, HealthPack, ItemEntity, NpcEntity, NpcRadiusEntity, NyanEntity, Player, PlayerPet, PvpEntity, ResourceNode, SniperMob, StatEntity, WarriorMob, WolfMob, Yralemounts, Zombiemounts

    public interface StatListener
    Statistic listeners can be added to HasStats objects and be notified when a StatEvent occurs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStatEvent(StatEvent event)
      Called when a StatEvent occurs in a HasStats object that we are listening to.

    • Method Detail

      • onStatEvent

        void onStatEvent(StatEvent event)
        Called when a StatEvent occurs in a HasStats object that we are listening to.
        Parameters:
        event - - the stat event
